title: Licks
description: 36 hours is a short spell when racing the clock.2,160 minutes is an eternity for old friends to fall in love…  August Cruz is the only man I’ve ever loved. He’s the one who got away. He’s the one I totally screwed over.  Now he’s standing on my doorstep, nine years later, but he’s not the only thing that turns up. My mother’s lost diary is in my hands, and it might lead me to my father. A possibility I wished for one year ago, at my last birthday.  I have 36 hours to fulfill that wish. I have 36 hours to drag August on a wild scavenger hunt. I have 36 hours to protect my heart before I lose him again...because there's something he's not telling me.  36 HOUR DATE is a full-length, standalone, sexy second chance romance, previously titled LICKS. One-click your copy today!
author: Kelly Siskind
